direction.description_zh: 布局方向，可选值为 `horizontal` vertical

rules.description: Validation rules, which return 'true' to indicate that the validation is passed, and the rest of the values are converted to text as user prompts
rules.description_zh: 验证规则，返回 `true` 表示验证通过，其余的值则转换为文本作为用户提示

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Clear the bound value (set to 'undefined') and the validation information
methods.description_zh: 清空绑定的值(设置为 `undefined`)和校验信息

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the change is made
